content: See them leaving the GOP a little at a time...it is a lost party and a has been. "http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2009/04/28/AR2009042801523_pf.html" "Pennsylvania Sen. Arlen Specter will switch parties and run for reelection in November 2010 as a Democrat, he announced today, a decision that could have wide-ranging consequences for the Senate and President Obama's agenda. "

Todays politics remind me of an old saying. - "Ideas are more powerful than guns. We would not let our enemies have guns, why should we let them have ideas?" - Joseph Stalin

title: Penn. Sen. Arlen Specter to Switch to Democratic Party

content: Flanked by GOP colleagues who stared straight ahead, McConnell said Specter visited him in his Senate office late yesterday afternoon "and told me quite candidly that he'd been informed by his pollster that it would be impossible for him to be reelected in Pennsylvania as a Republican because he could not win the primary; and he was also informed by his pollster that he could not get elected as an independent, and indicated that he had decided to become a Democrat." Grasping for some positive spin on an otherwise catastrophic setback, McConnell warned that Specter's defection could cripple Republican efforts "to restrain the excess that is typically associated with big majorities and single-party rule." He said the pressure would shift to Democrats from conservative states to provide the checks and balances that Senate Republicans would now struggle to provide. http :// www. washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2009/04/28/AR2009042801523_pf. html Hasn't he done enough damage for a lifetime? Why not just retire Arlen? I still can't get over your mismanagement of the Judiciary Committee? How you both acted as chairman of the committee, and advocate for the minority, at the same time. You undermined your primary function, and not even beginning to comprehend the damage you did to the process. You obstructed those hearings more than any other. You allowed the harm that was done to those nominees. At least you are out of the closet now. I apologize for being harsh on you Arlen, had you resigned from your chairmanship, and advocated your position as a standing member of the committee, I would have still disagreed with your position, yet respected your voice. The system is broken, your dysfunction, a single piece of the machine. I'm sure ACORN has plenty of extortion money, and federally funded busses, to help you with your reelection effort. We all are going to have to grow up sometime. GOP needs to rediscover what it means to be a vertebrae. Why over react to DNC labeling and attacks? In 96, in 2000, we were accused of wanting to starve old people and throw them into the streets. So RNC leaders out spent the Dem's. What purpose did it serve? What did it prove? We are accused of hating minorities, Weren't Abraham Lincoln and Martin Luther King both Republicans? I can safely say that I hate injustice, Partiality in judgment, misrepresentation, and criminal intent to name a few. I support a federal standard, state controlled ballot system with equal voice to all legal ballots. Positive ID. How do we determine the consent of the governed when we cannot even credibly confirm their position on candidates or issues. State to state, county to county, the standards vary. From my personal perspective, this and the maintenance of it, falls into Governments primary responsibility in serving the People whom justify It's existence. Oregon, I salute your paper ballot. Credibility, Verifiability, Transparency, Disclosure. We need to stand on our own visions and message, not feed on DUNC controlled avenues in the false hope of being treated fairly. We are in dark times, small minds are calling the shots and they are either very incompetent or very evil. Hang onto your wallets. Low tide may get offensive, it is our time for hope and vision. Lets consider rejecting that which is unreliable. They stall momentum, undermine principle. We need to focus on vision and direction, and protect against that which would corrupt. Vote them out before they cost us our Republic.
